scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.sweetest: npm run build:happ && npm run sweetest:quiet
scripts.launch:happ: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/map-holons.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network mdns
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.clean: npx rimraf target && npx rimraf .cargo && npx rimraf Cargo.lock && npx rimraf flake.lock

_comments.sweetest:quiet: Script to run tests with minimal tracing (warn level)
_comments.sweetest:trace: Script to run tests with detailed tracing (debug level)
_comments.sweetest:custom: Script to run tests with custom tracing levels. Defaults to 'warn' if env variables not already set
